comments.body: Some more rules-1. Gambling Currency must not be JET and CANDY. It must be any cryptocurrency available in Coins.game, since the minimum bet is $0.20, better if you play with any stablecoin.2. In case of a draw, both will share the prize.3. 6th prize, the random winner will be picked from all the participants by this giveaway manager- https://bitcoindata.science/giveaway-manager/4. We reserve the right to change any rules, however, only changes that make sense.5. The reward will be paid directly to your Bitcoin address.6. Last submission date- 14th October 23:59:59 UTC.Submit your entry in the below formation-Code:Screenshot of your bet with bet ID:Coins.game Username:Multiplier:Your BTC SegWit address:

Haha. Is this real? You set a 500x multiplier, but it's still going on. If you set at 500 it automatically cashed out, right? I had a problem with internet which caused this lol. At first, I even tried to cash out at 300x. Later I realized that it's because of internet problem.
